DD_Class_Full.name: Archival_Information_Package
DD_Class_Full.definition: The Archival Information Package (AIP) class defines an Information Package consisting of the Content Information and the associated Preservation Description Information (PDI), which is preserved within an archive that conforms to the Open Archive Information System (OAIS) Reference Model.

Terminological_Entry.name: Archival_Information_Package
Terminological_Entry.definition: The Archival Information Package (AIP) class defines an Information Package consisting of the Content Information and the associated Preservation Description Information (PDI), which is preserved within an archive that conforms to the Open Archive Information System (OAIS) Reference Model.
